additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 1500 health, 7.5 health regen, and 75 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 12.5 armor, 75 attack speed, and 75 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 900 mana, 3.75 mana regen, and 75 attack damage.
name: Apex
description: Three orbs of remarkable power bound within a single scepter.
